name: Bubble Guppies: Clean-Up Crew prototype
description:
A prototype for a Wii-motion game--players move the mouse to control a net and catch falling trash to help the Bubble Guppies clean up the ocean. Players catch as much trash as possible, collecting gold coin power-ups and avoiding fish to get the highest score possible when time runs out.

Design/Programming/Art: Natalie Orlando
with special thanks to Donovan Violette

Developed Nov-Dec 2016 for a class project
